title: What are the key principles and techniques of magnetic healing?
first_phrase: This text discusses the techniques and principles of magnetic healing, providing answers to questions about its effects on digestion, rheumatism, and headaches. It explains how to use passes to intercept and bind magnetic forces, which nerve nodes to target for different types of ailments, and which fingers are appropriate for specific conditions. The final 200 tokens focus on fortifying the body through passes aimed at reinforcing the immune system and how to magnify the state of somnambulism. The text also highlights the importance of properly directing energy to the appropriate areas and provides guidelines for different therapeutic approaches.
